title: 命令方块　盔甲架　简单的桌子
author: mo_yiljx
txt_content:
我是mo_yi，命令方块小白一个......第一次发帖，給大家发一个简单的小桌子，可以放置物品，新手作品，不喜勿喷．先上图！





QQ图片20160706145919.png (49.75 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

样子
2016-7-6 14:58 上传






钻石剑．．．





QQ图片20160706150138.png (63.91 KB, 下载次数: 4)

下载附件

2016-7-6 15:07 上传







金锭




QQ图片20160706150355.png (41.84 KB, 下载次数: 0)

下载附件

2016-7-6 15:02 上传





铁块




QQ图片20160706151558.png (46.18 KB, 下载次数: 1)

下载附件

2016-7-6 15:21 上传





接下来指令
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~ {Block:redstone_block,Time:1,Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~-1 ~ ~1 ~-14 ~ minecraft:redstone_block},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~1 ~2 ~ ~ ~-13 ~ minecraft:air},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:say -----------------------},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:say ----minecraft table---- by mo_yi},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:say -----------------------},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~-3 ~2 {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~+1 ~ ~-1 ~-2 ~ ~-1 air}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~2 ~ ~1 {Tile:152,Time:1}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~ ~2 {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~-1 ~1 ~-1 {Tile:152,Time:1}}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~2 ~ ~2 {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:fill ~ ~ ~-1 ~3 ~ ~-1 redstone_block}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~5 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:kill @e[type=Wolf,name=table]}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~4 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[type=Wolf,name=table] ~ ~ ~ /summon ArmorStand ~ ~1 ~ {DisabledSlots:1052688,Invulnerable:1b,Invisible:1b,Small:1b,ShowArms:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Rotation:[0f,0f],Pose:{Body:[0f,0f,0f],LeftArm:[0f,0f,0f],RightArm:[180f,0f,15.3846153846154f],LeftLeg:[0f,0f,0f],RightLeg:[0f,0f,0f],Head:[0f,0f,0f]},}}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~3 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[type=Wolf,name=table] ~ ~1 ~ /setblock ~ ~ ~ carpet}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:summon FallingSand ~2 ~ ~ {Tile:137,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:execute @e[type=Wolf,name=table] ~ ~ ~ /setblock ~ ~ ~ fence}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:give @a spawn_egg 1 95 {display:{Name:"table"}}},Riding:{id:FallingSand,Block:command_block,Time:1,TileEntityData:{Command:gamerule commandBlockOutput false}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码
用红石激活即可
下载指令

replies.author: jxudvv
replies.txt_content:
钻石剑不对啊，不应该平放在桌上么？
怎么立起来了

replies.author: 清风sx
replies.txt_content: 搞得跟真的一样，弄一个盔甲架加个手臂拿个东西隐个身就行了
地图不错，不过只能装饰
这个帖子很优秀 学到了
只需要填入命令方块就可以使用了吗》
